album.title: The Classic Cardovan
album.description: This refaced kitchen features Cordovan on Cherry with a Sabel Glaze. This classically rich cabinet color is highlighted with custom Classic Raised Panel style #10875. Countertop was supplied by the customer.

album.title: Breckenridge Light
album.description: This refaced kitchen features Antique White cabinets with a Walnut Glaze. This popular color is highlighted by the simple, yet elegant Breckenridge Square door style. Countertop supplied by customer.

album.title: Classic Cherry Tea
album.description: These Classic Cherry cabinets are made unique with a rich Black Glaze. The Vintage Raised Panel style brings decorative appeal to the Silestone Quartz countertops in Tea Leaf.

album.title: Canterbury Square
album.description: Antique White cabinets with a Walnut Glaze in Breckenridge Square style perfectly pair with the neutral variants in the Cambria Quartz countertop in Canterbury. The Corian backsplash in Sandalwood with an Offset Diamond pattern is both beautiful and durable.

album.title: The White Walnut
album.description: This traditional kitchen features the popular Antique White cabinet door color with a Walnut Glaze in Stonebridge style. The countertops are Granite certified by Kitchen Magic.

album.title: Maple Milan
album.description: These Hard Maple cabinets feature custom color #1767 and the Italian inspired Milan style. The subtle colors in the cabinets highlight the Silestone Quartz countertop in Santa Cecelia with a Hanover edge.

album.title: Black Cherry Island
album.description: This beautifully refaced kitchen features classic Washington Cherry cabinets with a rich Black Glaze in a Classic Raised Panel style #10875. Countertop supplied by customer.

album.title: The Cherry Sable Capri
album.description: This simple, yet classic kitchen features Cordovan Cherry cabinets with a Sabel Glaze in Classic Raised Panel style #30 and #10. The light color of the Silestone Quartz Countertop in Capri Limestone brings contrast to the kitchen.

album.title: Cherry Uba Tuba
album.description: Cordovan on Cherry cabinetry graced with sabel glaze on a classic raised panel door. The counters are furnished with luxurious Uba Tuba granite.

album.title: Maples of Winter Island
album.description: This light and airy kitchen features Hard Maple cabinets with a Natural glaze in Classic Raised Panel style #10. The durable and maintenance-free countertop is Corian Solid Surface in Tumbleweed with an Eased edge. The island brings contrast to the room Winter White cabinets with a Walnut Glaze in Stonebridge and a Zodiaq Quartz countertop in Smokey Topaz.

album.title: Cordovan Cherry Greens
album.description: This kitchen bridges traditional and contemporary design with Cordovan Cherry cabinets in Classic Raised Panel style #10 and Granite certified by Kitchen Magic countertops in Tunis Green/Verde Peacock. The custom hutch features Granite countertops in Eucalyptus Green.

album.title: Prestigious Dunewood Square
album.description: Neutral kitchens never go out of style, which led this homeowner to choose Dunewood cabinets in Prestige Square style, which contrast perfectly with the Zodiaq Quartz countertop in Mystic Black with a Roundover edge.

album.title: Maple White Galaxy
album.description: The Maple cabinets in Alpine White with Classic Raised Panel style #10 give this kitchen a clean look. The Zodiaq Quartz countertops in Mystic Black with a Roundover edge bring dramatic contrast to the space.

album.title: Warm Winter in Stonebridge
album.description: This kitchen uses warm and cool tones bring a unique style to the space, featuring Winter White cabinets with a Walnut Glaze in Stonebridge style and Granite certified by Kitchen Magic countertops in Juparana Crema Bordeaux with a Roundover edge.

album.title: Secret Maple Harvest
album.description: This Fall inspiration features Maple cabinets with custom color #1737 and President Raised Panel style #M30. The countertop is Granite certified by Kitchen Magic in Autumn Wheat.

album.title: Lancaster Raised Cherry
album.description: These Classic Cherry cabinets with Vintage Raised Panel style highlight the golden variants in the Cambria Quartz countertop in Lancaster with a Roundover edge.

album.title: Maple Harvest Gold
album.description: The custom wood cabinets are made from Hard Maple in Harvest Gold with a Pewter Glaze in the simple Square style. The countertops are durable Corian Solid Surface in Rain Cloud with an Eased edge.

album.title: Hazelnut Mountain Mist
album.description: This refaced kitchen features Hazelnut cabinets with Vintage Raised Panel style and Silestone Quartz countertops in Mountain Mist with a Bevel Edge.

album.title: White Walnut Island in Cordovan
album.description: This classical design features Cordovan Cherry cabinets with Classic Raised Panel style #10875 and Granite certified by Kitchen Magic countertops in Galaxy Black with a Bevel edge. The island helps break up the visible space by offering the contrasting colors of Antique White cabinets with a Walnut glaze in Breckenridge style and Granite countertops in New Venecian Gold.

album.title: The Cordovan Crown
album.description: This kitchen highlights regal inspirations with Cordovan Cherry cabinets in Classic Raised Panel Style #10875. The Rope crown moulding adds sophistication and added aesthetic appeal. Countertop supplied by customer.

album.title: Maple, Pewter and Pepper
album.description: The Maple Harvest Gold cabinets with a Pewter Glaze bring warmth to this traditional kitchen. The traditional design is continued through the cabinets in Mitered Classic Raised Panel style #10875 and the Corian countertop in Pepper Ivory.

album.title: The Euro
album.description: This kitchen features contemporary European design schemes with Hardrock Maple cabinets in Euro Plain style. Countertop supplied by customer.

album.title: Custom Glass and Green
album.description: Exclusive styles are brought forth through the custom-colored cabinets in Classic Raised Panel style #10875. The kitchen is given a unique edge with Zodiaq Quartz countertops in Argo Green with a Roudover edge.

album.title: Hard Maple Island
album.description: The traditional details in this kitchen are highlighted by the Hard Maple Autumn cabinets with a Maple-White glaze. For a custom look, the homeowner chose different styles for the upper and lower cabinets--#90209 for the upper, and #10209 for the lower. Countertop supplied by customer.

album.title: Maple Caramel Espresso
album.description: This small kitchen is designed to look larger with Hard Maple cabinets with a Natural Finish and Caramel Glaze. The Miter style in Classic Raised Panel style #10827 adds grandeur, while the floating shelves in Espresso make the kitchen appear more expansive by breaking up the space. The countertop is Cambria Quartz in Wellington.

album.title: The Prestige Cathedral
album.description: This commonly shaped kitchen features the warm tones of Cherry Pear cabinets and the prominent arches of Prestige Cathedral styled cabinets. The Silestone Quartz countertops in Black Canyon pair perfectly with neutral cabinets.

album.title: Crowned Cordovan
album.description: This classic kitchen has glamorous style thanks to the Cordovan on Cherry cabinets with Classic Raised Panel style #10875, and Granite Certified by Kitchen Magic in New Venecian Gold. The backsplash features maintenance-free Solid Surface Meganite in Canvas Mist.

album.title: The Frosty White
album.description: This designer favorite features Hard Maple cabinets with a Frosty White colourtone and Madison style. The simple white cabinets are contrasted with the dark Cambria countertops in Edinborough.

album.title: Maple Espresso Gold
album.description: This contemporary kitchen design features Hard Maple cabinets in Espresso with Classic Raised Panel style #10. The countertops are Granite certified by Kitchen Magic in New Venecian Gold.

album.title: The Antique Statesman
album.description: This colorful kitchen features Antique White cabinets with Statesman style. The island also features Statesman style cabinets in Chocolate Pear. These simple elements are highlighted by the dark Cambria Quartz countertop in Oakhampton.

album.title: Maple Harvest Glaze
album.description: Description coming soon.

album.title: Ginger Cherry Gold
album.description: This kitchen features Ginger on Cherry enhanced with Classic Raised Panel doors. The Vyana Gold Granite counters and backsplash top off this bright and cheery design.

album.title: Vintage Hazelnut
album.description: Hazelnut Custom Cabinetry adorns this new kitchen redesign complete with our popular Vintage Raised Panel doors. The beautiful quartz countertops are none other than Canterbury by Cambria.

album.title: Black and White Chocolate
album.description: Antique White cabinets in our Manchester style beautifully contrasts the Chololate Pear island dressed up Prestige Kershaw style. The Black Galaxy countertops complete this simple, yet elegent design.

album.title: Black Cherry Canterbury
album.description: This all new kitchen is designed with Classic Cherry maintenance-free cabinets, accented with Black Glaze in popular Vintage Raised Panel style. The luxury quartz countertop is made by Cambria. The selection is Canterbury.
